title: Sri Lanka parliament follows Emperor Diocletian after printing money
snippet: Sri Lanka's parliament has approved the hiking of fines for breaking price controls by as much as 3,900 percent amid the worst money printing in the country's history but stopped short of the death penalty decreed by Roman Emperor Diocletian.
